      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.comm that implement Channel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AuthenticatedChannel
      This channel ensures UnlimitedTimes security level.
      class  ChannelDecorator
      We use the Decorator Pattern in order to add features to the basic Channel.
      class  EncryptedChannel
      This channel ensures CPA security level.
      class  FasterTCPChannel 
      class  PlainChannel 
      class  PlainTCPChannel
      This class represents a concrete channel in the Decorator Pattern used to create Channels.

    • Uses of Channel in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamalHash

      Constructors in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamalHash with parameters of type Channel 
      Constructor and Description
      CmtElGamalHashCommitter(Channel channel)
      This constructor receives as argument the channel and chosses default values of Dlog Group and Cryptographic Hash such that they keep the condition that the size in bytes of the resulting hash is less than the size in bytes of the order of the DlogGroup.
      CmtElGamalHashCommitter(Channel channel, DlogGroup dlog, CryptographicHash hash, java.security.SecureRandom random)
      This constructor receives as arguments an instance of a Dlog Group and an instance of a Cryptographic Hash such that they keep the condition that the size in bytes of the resulting hash is less than the size in bytes of the order of the DlogGroup.
      CmtElGamalHashReceiver(Channel channel)
      This constructor receives as argument the channel and chosses default values of Dlog Group and Cryptographic Hash such that they keep the condition that the size in bytes of the resulting hash is less than the size in bytes of the order of the DlogGroup.
      CmtElGamalHashReceiver(Channel channel, DlogGroup dlog, CryptographicHash hash)
      This constructor receives as arguments an instance of a Dlog Group and an instance of a Cryptographic Hash such that they keep the condition that the size in bytes of the resulting hash is less than the size in bytes of the order of the DlogGroup.
